details: V-neck collar with a slightly turned-down collar point
Vertical ribbing pattern throughout the fabric
Short sleeves that are fitted and end above the elbow
Seam stitching along the shoulders and sides
Hemmed bottom edge of the shirt
Small black button at the collar's neckline

suggestions.party: For a party, pair this brown ribbed polo shirt with a high-waisted, slim-fit black leather skirt embellished with subtle metallic studs along the hemline for a touch of glam. Add a layered gold necklace with small coin pendants, matching gold hoop earrings, and a stack of thin gold bangles on one wrist. Footwear should be sleek black stilettos with a pointed toe and ankle strap. Carry a metallic clutch bag in gold or bronze with subtle shine. Complete the look with a bold red lipstick, smoky eye makeup, and a chic, wavy hairstyle for an effortlessly stylish appearance.
suggestions.office: For an office outfit, match this shirt with tailored beige or grey high-waisted trousers with a sharp crease down the front, and a fitted navy blazer with subtle pinstripes. Accessorize with simple pearl stud earrings, a delicate silver watch, and a thin leather belt in a matching shade. Shoes should be classic pointed-toe black leather pumps with a modest heel. Carry a structured black leather tote or satchel, and wear natural makeup with nude lipstick. Style your hair in a neat ponytail or soft waves for a professional and polished look.
suggestions.vacation: On vacation, pair this brown ribbed polo shirt with a flowy, knee-length beige or cream-colored maxi skirt with a subtle floral print. Add a wide-brim straw hat and oversized sunglasses for sun protection. Use layered beaded necklaces and wicker or rattan earrings for a boho vibe. Footwear should be comfortable tan leather sandals with minimal straps. Carry a canvas tote with colorful embroidery or patterns. Finish with light, sun-kissed makeup, a natural lip gloss, and loose beach waves for a relaxed, chic appearance.
